original_text: In this paper, we present algorithms for automatic generation of logic reasoning questions. The algorithms are able to construct questions that are solvable with unique solutions. The algorithms employ AI techniques such as semantic networks to produce verbal questions. These algorithms are small in size and are able to replace traditional question databases. They are particularly suitable for implementation on the memory constrained mobile platforms. The algorithms can be applied to question generation for job interview, civil service exam, etc.
original_translation: En este documento, presentamos algoritmos para la generación automática de preguntas de razonamiento lógico. Los algoritmos son capaces de construir preguntas que son resolubles con soluciones únicas. Los algoritmos emplean técnicas de inteligencia artificial como redes semánticas para producir preguntas verbales. Estos algoritmos son pequeños en tamaño y pueden reemplazar bases de datos de preguntas tradicionales. Son particularmente adecuados para implementarse en plataformas móviles con limitaciones de memoria. Los algoritmos se pueden aplicar a la generación de preguntas para entrevistas de trabajo, exámenes de servicio civil, etc.

The algorithms employ AI techniques such as semantic networks to produce verbal questions.
These algorithms are small in size and are able to replace traditional question databases.
They are particularly suitable for implementation on the memory constrained mobile platforms.
The algorithms can be applied to question generation for job interview, civil service exam, etc.
